test-case.name: merge-001
test-case.description: xsl:merge test on a homogeneous collection of XML log files.

result.assert-xml: <events><event timestamp="2009-08-20T12:01:01Z">Transaction T1234 started</event ><event timestamp="2009-08-20T12:01:05Z">Transaction T1236 started</event ><event timestamp="2009-08-20T12:01:08Z">Transaction T1235 started</event ><event timestamp="2009-08-20T12:01:09Z">Transaction T1236 ended</event ><event timestamp="2009-08-20T12:01:11Z">Transaction T1237 started</event ><event timestamp="2009-08-20T12:01:12Z">Transaction T1235 ended</event ><event timestamp="2009-08-20T12:01:15Z">Transaction T1234 ended</event ><event timestamp="2009-08-20T12:01:17Z">Transaction T1237 ended</event></events>

test-case.name: merge-002
test-case.description: xsl:merge test on two heterogeneous files.

test-case.description: xsl:merge test on two heterogeneous files. Testing merge-key, where order attribute requires run-time evaluation

test-case.name: merge-005
test-case.description: xsl:merge: xsl:merge-source that uses a path expression that selects more than one node in an attribute value template (test with context)

result.assert-xml: <results><result><event timestamp="2009-08-20T12:01:01Z">Transaction T1234 started</event ><event timestamp="2009-08-20T12:01:08Z">Transaction T1235 started</event ><event timestamp="2009-08-20T12:01:12Z">Transaction T1235 ended</event ><event timestamp="2009-08-20T12:01:15Z">Transaction T1234 ended</event ></result><result><event timestamp="2009-08-20T12:01:15Z">Transaction T1234 ended</event ><event timestamp="2009-08-20T12:01:12Z">Transaction T1235 ended</event ><event timestamp="2009-08-20T12:01:08Z">Transaction T1235 started</event ><event timestamp="2009-08-20T12:01:01Z">Transaction T1234 started</event ></result></results>

test-case.description: The @select attribute of xsl:merge-key should be a singleton, but evaluated to be a sequence of items

modified.change: For incomparable merge-keys, the error should be XTTE2230 instead of XTTE1020

test-case.description: Test xsl:merge - perform sort with a xsl:merge-input

test-case.description: Sequence of merge-input is text, but the data-type attribute of xsl:merge-key is number

test-case.description: Test xsl:merge-key with different languages.

modified.change: XTDE2210 instead of XTSE2220, corrected invalid sequence type to function(*).

test-case.description: Test xsl:merge-input with keys that have different order attributes.

modified.change: XTDE2210 instead of XTSE2220, updated description, the order attributes are different.

test-case.description: Test xsl:merge-key context: visibility of variable defined in xsl:merge-input

modified.change: Change expected error; xsl:merge-input is no longer a valid element, so the original error no longer applies

test-case.description: xsl:merge-keys in corresponding merge-inputs not comparable

modified.change: Replaced CDATA XML with standard XML file (same data, no indentation)
Revert changes to .xsl file, which appear to have been made for diagnostic purposes

test-case.name: merge-030

test-case.description: xsl:merge-source test with zero xsl:merge-input child elements

test-case.name: merge-032a
test-case.description: xsl:merge-key test with select attribute has non-empty content

modified.change: change expected error code (obsolete)
Error XTSE2190 doesn't exist anymore, correct error is XTSE3200
Bug #30407. See merge-032b/c. Renamed to merge-032a. Fixed other errors (sort-before-merge could raise XTSE0020, absence of select attrib could raise XTSE0010) so that XTSE3200 can be raised

test-case.name: merge-032b
test-case.description: Bug #30407. xsl:merge-source without select attribute, from original merge-032a

test-case.name: merge-032c
test-case.description: Bug #30407. xsl:merge-srouce with wrong value for sort-before-merge, from original merge-032a

test-case.description: xsl:merge-source is in the wrong place

test-case.description: Testing a sequence of more than one item is not allowed as the @select attr of merge-key

modified.change: XTTE1020 is no longer the correct error here, when a merge-key cannot be compared, the errors should be XTTE2230

test-case.name: merge-041
test-case.description: xsl:merge test on two heterogeneous files. Testing merge-key, where order attribute requires run-time evaluation. Mixing different ways of selecting different sources. Also tests use of xml:base affecting URI resolution.

modified.change: add streaming dependency

test-case.name: merge-042
test-case.description: Error - can't specify both for-each-item and for-each-source

modified.change: more specific error code
XTSE0020 is no longer valid, for this specific scenario, the spec has XTSE3195 now

test-case.name: merge-043
test-case.description: Error - for-each-source expected type is string

test-case.name: merge-044
test-case.description: xsl:merge: current-merge-group with source name argument

test-case.name: merge-045
test-case.description: xsl:merge: current-merge-group with source name argument; unknown source name

test-case.name: merge-046
test-case.description: xsl:merge: current-merge-group with source name argument; invalid source name

modified.change: XTSE0020 can be thrown for the name attribute, but the code as written may also hiccup statically on XTDE3490, which should be raised on fn:current-merge-group
Make initial template 'xsl:initial-template' public, private named templates are not eligible initial templates (bug #30398)
Change environment reference, original merge002 contained context node, which forces apply-templates invocation, while the goal of the test is call-template invocation

test-case.name: merge-046a
test-case.description: xsl:merge: xsl:merge-source/@name not an NCName

modified.change: Make initial template 'xsl:initial-template' public, private named templates are not eligible initial templates (bug #30398)
Change environment reference, original merge002 contained context node, which forces apply-templates invocation, while the goal of the test is call-template invocation

test-case.name: merge-046b
test-case.description: xsl:merge: fn:current-merge-group with invalid source name argument, not an NCName, but must raise XTDE3490

modified.change: Make initial template 'xsl:initial-template' public, private named templates are not eligible initial templates (bug #30398)
Change environment reference, original merge002 contained context node, which forces apply-templates invocation, while the goal of the test is call-template invocation

result.assert-xml: <root><subjects><subject name="C#"><media type="cast"><title>cast 1</title></media><media type="book"><title>book 1</title></media></subject ><subject name="VB"><media type="cast"><title>cast 2</title></media></subject ><subject name="XQuery"><media type="cast"><title>cast 3</title></media><media type="book"><title>book 2</title></media></subject ><subject name="XSLT"><media type="cast"><title>cast 4</title></media><media type="cast"><title>cast 5</title></media ><media type="book"><title>book 3</title></media><media type="book"><title>book 4</title></media></subject ></subjects></root>

test-case.name: merge-092
test-case.description: Merge keys are evaluated with singleton focus

result.assert-xml: <root><group key="1"><foo>foo 1</foo><bar>bar 1</bar><bar>bar 2</bar><foo>foo 2</foo><baz>baz 1</baz><foo>foo a</foo><bar>bar a</bar><bar>bar b</bar><foo>foo b</foo><baz>baz a</baz></group></root>

test-case.name: merge-093
test-case.description: A random example from StackOverflow

test-case.name: merge-094
test-case.description: xsl:merge test on two heterogeneous files; not streamable because select expression is crawling

test-case.name: merge-095
test-case.description: xsl:merge test on two heterogeneous files; not streamable because sort-before-merge="yes"

test-case.name: merge-096
test-case.description: current-merge-group() called in arguments of function call - Saxon bug 3884

test-case.name: merge-097
test-case.description: Saxon bug 3883. With streamable="no", the output contains 8 item elements. See https://saxonica.plan.io/issues/3883 for reasoning. No snapshot of the nodes is taken.

modified.change: Added dependency XP31 because of presence of fn:sort

test-case.name: merge-097s
test-case.description: Saxon bug 3883. With streamable="yes", the output contains 4 item elements. See https://saxonica.plan.io/issues/3883 for reasoning. A snapshot is taken of each node.

test-case.name: merge-097sf
test-case.description: Saxon bug 3883. With streamable="yes", the output contains 4 item elements. A snapshot is taken of each node even though we are falling back to use a non-streaming processor.

test-case.name: merge-098
test-case.description: Saxon bug 4275. Merging two streamed selections from the same input document.

modified.change: Use base-uri rather than document-uri

test-case.name: merge-099
test-case.description: Saxon bug 4314. current-merge-group() called on rhs of bang operator.

modified.change: Tests with assert-xml should not use indent='yes'

test-case.name: merge-100
test-case.description: xsl:merge: current-merge-group() not available in called function.

test-case.name: merge-101
test-case.description: xsl:merge: current-merge-key() not available in called function.
